MOD = 1000000007

def solve():
    q = int(input())
    for _ in range(q):
        n, c = map(int, input().split())
        ans = n
        for i in range(1, 35):
            time_clone = i * c
            if time_clone >= n:
                break
            remaining_time = n - time_clone
            leaflets = (1 << i) * remaining_time
            ans = max(ans, leaflets)
        print(ans % MOD)

solve()
